title: Chinese clinical practice guidelines for super minimally invasive surgery of digestive tract tumors.
abstract: The mode of organ resection and reconstruction that has been used to treat digestive tract tumors (DTTs) can cure the disease. However, it involves the surgical resection of critical structures (such as the cardia, pylorus, and anus) and gastrointestinal reconstruction, which alter the physiological anatomy of the digestive system.
